mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_ID, PASSWORD, EMAIL, PHONE, BIRTHDAY, MEMBER_ROLE, IS_ENABLED) VALUES (#{memberId},#{password}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birthday}, #{memberRole}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS user_count FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND PASSWORD = #{password} AND IS_ENABLED = 1
SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND IS_ENABLED = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
